name: ssz-universal-verifier-workspace
description: Streaming 32-byte Chunk Producer + Incremental Merkleizer with strict SSZ canonical checks

scripts.test: npm run test:basic && npm run test:extended
scripts.test:all: npm run test:basic && npm run test:extended
scripts.bench:native: npm run build:native && tsc && node dist/tests/bench-native.js
scripts.build:native: cd native && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:wasm:simd: cd wasm && RUSTFLAGS='-C target-feature=+simd128' wasm-pack build --target web -- --features simd
